description:
dark colored wooden rifle with brass trigger and trigger plate; engravings on wood neck; engravings on trigger plate; silver colored plate behind lock has initials TS engraved; brass barrel, brass mounts, carved maple stock; style of Virginia rifle from James River section of the southern Shenandoah Valley, 1771. 
Arms and Armor-Firearm
title: Virginia-Style Flintlock Longrifle
